item.title: WATCH: Medieval tower partially collapses in Rome
item.description: One worker was critically injured and another trapped in the collapse, authorities said.

item.title: Avalanche on Nepal mountain Yalung Ri kills 7 including foreign climbers
item.description: Officials in Nepal say an avalanche swept through a camp on Mount Yalung Ri on Monday and killed five foreign climbers and two Nepali guides

item.title: WATCH: LA Dodgers fans take to streets to celebrate World Series win
item.description: Celebrating fans took to the streets in Los Angeles as the Dodgers won their second consecutive World Series.

item.title: Obama, Harris hit the campaign trail; Trump's political operation invests in NJ, Va.

item.title: One year out from Election Day 2026, Tuesday's results could shape 2026 midterms
item.description: ABC News is taking a look at the 2026 midterms, now just one year away.
